posts.post_title: WTTF/WTB: T206 Cobb Red, Bat Off & Lajoie w/ Bat
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jason Silvey
I'd like to trade for or buy the all the cards above. In the Cobbs, I'm looking for something around a 2 or lower. In the Lajoie, probably a 3 or lower and ungraded cards are fine as well for both. All of the T206s on the link are available except the Joss. Thanks.

Jason
